string.text: Thanks, dude.
Thanks to you from "Duty"
Thanks on behalf of the entire "Duty" faction
Thanks a lot to you.
That's a stuff, dude! Give me another one.
Nothing happens here! This is a test level, jerk.
Well, time to time someone goes knocked down. Whilst someone dies himself. Life is life.
Well, I'm here for not so long, protecting that blockhead in gaudy outfit.
What's your business in it? You are a spy, aren't you? Be off with you!
Here... er... happening... Oh! happening! You're genius, dude!
Have you heard? Gunslinger is back!
The flesh is extremely good, when it's cooked on the aircraft fuel.
It's said that there is a klondike of artifacts! And the one who finds it - will be rich. Astonishingly rich. Do you hear?! ASTONISHINGLY!
AAAA! They've killed Kenny! Dumb assholes!
Freedom - is the gathering of freaks, created in order to train their pets in the Zone!
Dude, if you haven't been to the army, don't you enter Duty. Those grunts will torture us with their statute.
Hello, hobo!
Duty greets you!
Good day, sir!
Hello, can I help you somehow?
Freedom can't be stopped!
Need first-aid kit... I'm dying!
Information on "Groza". 1000 cash.
Information on "FN2000". 2000 cash.
Information on the flesh. 500 cash.
Information on the safe places at cordon. 100 cash.
